title: BAE Systems brings South Korea’s Hanwha into intelligence-gathering constellation
key_assets: Azalea intelligence, surveillance, and reconnaissance constellation
summary: BAE Systems and Hanwha Systems have announced a partnership to explore integrating Hanwha’s synthetic aperture radar (SAR) technology with BAE’s RF technology for the Azalea constellation. This collaboration follows a previous agreement with ICEYE, which is still providing a SAR satellite for the initial cluster. The partnership aims to enhance military and disaster response capabilities and expand into new international markets.
why_it_matters: This partnership strengthens the UK-South Korea defense and space technology relationship, enhances the capabilities of the Azalea constellation, and expands opportunities for both companies in international markets. ICEYE’s ongoing involvement highlights its role as a key SAR technology provider in the project.
